abstract: The legal wrangling over the troubled crime drama “Black Water Transit” has taken another turn, with the film’s backer quietly settling a $3.1 million lawsuit brought by a producer on the eve of trial.
snippet: The legal wrangling over the troubled crime drama “Black Water Transit” has taken another turn, with the film’s backer quietly settling a $3.1 million lawsuit brought by a producer on the eve of trial.
lead_paragraph: The legal wrangling over the troubled crime drama “Black Water Transit” has taken another turn, with the film’s backer quietly settling a $3.1 million lawsuit brought by a producer on the eve of trial, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Backer Settles Suit Over Crime Drama
